showScoreExcerpt: "Impeccably directed by Anne Kauffman, with acting to match by a cast of four, this production keeps developing in your head...It initially has the look and feel of a featherweight work — of a cool, low-key domestic comedy of ideas, built on a single ingenious gimmick. But at some point, you realize that it’s been landing skillfully targeted punch after punch, right where it hurts."

keyPhrases.quote: Impeccably directed by Anne Kauffman, with acting to match by a cast of four
landing skillfully targeted punch after punch, right where it hurts
this production keeps developing in your head

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Strong praise for direction ('impeccably'), performances ('acting to match'), and emotional impact ('landing skillfully targeted punch after punch'), with recognition of the work's deceptive depth and lasting impression. | GPT-4o-mini: The review highlights strong direction and performances, indicating a clear recommendation despite initial reservations about the show's lightness.
